pp1.4:2.1_0: Asappuriso, asappurisena asappurisataro, sappuriso, sappurisena sappurisataro.
pp1.4:3.1_0: Pāpo, pāpena pāpataro, kalyāṇo, kalyāṇena kalyāṇataro.
pp1.4:4.1_0: Pāpadhammo, pāpadhammena pāpadhammataro, kalyāṇadhammo, kalyāṇadhammena kalyāṇadhammataro.
pp1.4:16.1_0: Atthekacco puggalo ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā avaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti,
pp1.4:16.1_1: atthekacco puggalo ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā vaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti,
pp1.4:16.1_2: atthekacco puggalo ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṁ upadaṁsitā hoti,
pp1.4:16.1_3: atthekacco puggalo ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṁ upadaṁsitā hoti.
pp1.4:17.1_0: Atthekacco puggalo anuvicca pariyogāhetvā avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti,
pp1.4:17.1_1: atthekacco puggalo anuvicca pariyogāhetvā vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti,
pp1.4:17.1_2: atthekacco puggalo anuvicca pariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṁ upadaṁsitā hoti,
pp1.4:17.1_3: atthekacco puggalo anuvicca pariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṁ upadaṁsitā hoti.
pp1.4:18.1_0: Atthekacco puggalo avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena,
pp1.4:18.1_1: no ca kho vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena;
pp1.4:18.2_0: atthekacco puggalo vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena,
pp1.4:18.2_1: no ca kho avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena;
pp1.4:18.3_0: atthekacco puggalo avaṇṇārahassa ca avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena;
pp1.4:18.4_0: vaṇṇārahassa ca vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena,
pp1.4:18.4_1: atthekacco puggalo neva avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena,
pp1.4:18.4_2: no ca vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena.
pp1.4:20.1_0: Tamo tamaparāyano, tamo jotiparāyano, joti tamaparāyano, joti jotiparāyano.
pp1.4:25.1_0: Atthekacco puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya;
pp1.4:25.2_0: atthekacco puggalo parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya;
pp1.4:25.3_0: atthekacco puggalo attahitāya ceva paṭipanno hoti parahitāya ca;
pp1.4:25.4_0: atthekacco puggalo neva attahitāya paṭipanno hoti no parahitāya.
pp1.4:26.3_0: atthekacco puggalo attantapo ca hoti attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto,
pp1.4:26.4_0: atthekacco puggalo neva attantapo hoti na attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto,
pp1.4:26.5_0: So anattantapo aparantapo diṭṭheva dhamme nicchāto nibbuto sītībhūto sukhappaṭisaṁvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharati.
pp1.4:28.1_0: Atthekacco puggalo lābhī hoti ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa, na lābhī adhipaññādhammavipassanāya;
pp1.4:28.2_0: atthekacco puggalo lābhī hoti adhipaññādhammavipassanāya, na lābhī ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa;
pp1.4:28.3_0: atthekacco puggalo lābhī ceva hoti ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa, lābhī ca adhipaññādhammavipassanāya;
pp1.4:28.4_0: atthekacco puggalo neva lābhī hoti ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa, na lābhī adhipaññādhammavipassanāya.
